summary:
Belgium is a country in Europe with a long history. It's located between the Netherlands, Germany, Luxembourg, and France. With over 11 million people, it's one of the most crowded countries in Europe. The capital is Brussels, and other big cities include Antwerp and Ghent.

Belgium is a monarchy with a unique government, divided into three regions: Flanders, Wallonia, and Brussels. It has a mix of Dutch, French, and German speakers. The country gained independence in 1830 and has been an important part of European history, especially during World War I and II. Today, Brussels is a major center for the European Union.
title: Belgium
